item.description:
70 signed up between 2 groups. We have 2 hosts & may do 2 tours 10 minutes apart. One of us will stick to the times below.

THIS is a participatory tour, please tell us what you know! We'll be asking you!

This Meetup is co- posted to another major Meetup group.

Your hosts are expert Meetup organizers as well as longstanding Central Sq. residents.

Contemporary secrets of Central Square!

Times are approximate: (except for start time).
Schedule:

3:00 PM: City Hall
3:15 PM: Rodneys Bookstore (also a very affordable gift store).
3:30 PM --Ten Thousand Villages

3:50 PM: Cafe Andala
4:05 PM: Artist & Crafstman (closes at 5) Discover what "Hogwash" is. See who can find it first!
4:20 PM: Dance Complex (closes at 5). We are going to swarm through this as individuals  (there are 4 floors) so as not to interrupt classes!
(4:45 PM: a gap of 15 min's to allow people to catch up);
5:00 PM: Phoenix Landing, major stop. They have half price off their appetizers. Highly recommended: the $5 fish tacos, (special ends at 7 PM sharp).
5:45 PM: Middle East, (see if you can find the secret passageway! We'll go through the passageway a few at a time so as to not interrupt work there.)
6:00 PM: CCTV
6:15: Asgard Pub
6:30: Cafe Luna
6:45 PM: "Grafftti Alley"
7:00 PM: The Field patio, our last stop.

Rain forecast will postpone this event so check back.

Take the Red Line to Central (or check out the Green St. Parking Garage).
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the foot of the stairs at the main entrance
item.name: The 7 Wonders of Central Square (Cambridge), an Unofficial Tour
